ingredients.item: 150g essential Waitrose Whole Grain Easy Cook Rice
Zest and juice ½ essential Waitrose Lemon
100g essential Waitrose Scottish Smoked Salmon, shredded
½ x 230g pack essential Waitrose Sour Cream And Chive Dip

instructions.step: Cook the rice in boiling water for 20-25 minutes until tender, then drain and cool completely.
Mix in the sweetcorn, lemon zest and juice, salad onions and salmon. Stir in the sour cream dip and serve.
